welcome.clientlist.title: Who is using Gitpay
welcome.consulting.item.primary: We help you to use agile processes to improve your company's outcomes
welcome.consulting.item.secondary: Create demands for your business, we will deliver results with agile tools
welcome.consulting.item.two.secondary: By developers, for developers, GitPay helps with content management
welcome.consulting.item.three.secondary: We support infrastructures includingAmazon, Heroku and Google Cloud. Simply connect your project with Git
welcome.how.item.secondary: GitPay is an open environment and community of developers, global, inclusive and supportive. Come as you are.
welcome.how.item.two.secondary: To start: fork the project and send your solution through a change request
welcome.how.item.three.primary: Your code will be reviewed and when approved merged into the codebase. You will then receive the bounty for that issue
welcome.how.item.three.secondary: Once you send your solution, the maintainer will review, and you can discuss the solution proposed in detail, and once approved the code is merged and you will receive a bounty in your registered account
welcome.how.title: How it works
welcome.how.people.title: How it works
welcome.main.item.one.primary: Contribute to projects with development tools
welcome.main.item.one.secondary: We use Git to collaboratively track your deliveries
welcome.main.item.two.primary: Be assigned to issues you're interested in and send your solution
welcome.main.item.two.secondary: Work on different projects, collaborate and learn with stacks
welcome.companies.item.one.primary: Import issues that need to be solved
welcome.companies.item.one.secondary: Add issues from GitHub or Bitbucket and set deadlines in GitPay in order to track their progress and delivery
welcome.companies.item.two.secondary: Our contributors come from different backgrounds and have the experience to solve your issues. We offer different levels of support to get it done
welcome.companies.item.three.primary: Add bounties and receive proposals from contributors
welcome.companies.item.three.secondary: Add bounties to pay collaborators for work accomplished, or crowdfund to reward contributors. You can also give a chance to beginners to solve issues as they learn
welcome.howto.item.one.primary: Import an issue from GitHub or BitBucket
welcome.howto.item.one.secondary: You can easily import issues from GitHub or Bitbucket and our community will be notified to then make offers of interest to work on your project
welcome.howto.item.two.primary: Your request has been sent to our community
welcome.howto.item.two.secondary: We do internal campaigns to let users know about projects and opportunities that match their interest. You will be notified of interested users ranging from beginners looking for learning to advanced contributors
welcome.howto.item.three.primary: The contributor sent a pull request to claim your bounty
welcome.howto.item.three.secondary: A pull request is the proposed solution that will be reviewed. Once approved, the bounty is sent directly to the contributor's bank account
welcome.howto.item.four.primary: Agile and integrated process for management and development
welcome.howto.item.four.secondary: We use tools and agile process to make transactions and payments between collaborators and companies easier, serving startups to established companies
welcome.tagline.companies.main.headline: For companies
welcome.tagline.headline.how.title: How it works
welcome.companies.item.primary: For companies of all types and sizes
welcome.companies.item.secondary: Distributed collaboration helps companies grows. We provide a great solution to have your tasks solved, using agile process and collaboration
welcome.companies.title: For companies
welcome.who.item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers - anyone involved a project can follow the progress and status using GitPay's powerful tools for remote teams
welcome.who.item.two.secondary: Beginners will learn how contribute to real companies with real projects, and experienced contributors can help with revisions and more difficult tasks. Simply choose projects and tasks suitable to your abilities
welcome.who.item.three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
welcome.who.item.three.secondary: Work on projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools with which you're familiar. Propose solutions for issues that you know. You can then be assigned to new challenges
welcome.workflow.item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers - everyone can follow the progress and status of a project using known tools to manage their teams
welcome.workflow.item.two.secondary: Beginners will learn how contribute to real companies with real projects, while experienced contributors can help with revisions and more difficult tasks. It is possible to choose projects and based on what you'd like to learn and your current comfort level
welcome.workflow.item.three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
welcome.workflow.item.three.secondary: Work on different projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools with which you're familiar. Propose solutions for issues that you know. You will then have the ability to be assigned to new challenges
welcome.collab.item.one.primary: Collaborate between members, maintainers and clients
welcome.collab.item.one.secondary: Collaborate to receive help and support from a proven community of talent
welcome.collab.item.two.primary: Work with smart integrations and tools
welcome.collab.item.two.secondary: Focus on the issue at hand and let our automated workflow help to get the job done
welcome.collab.item.three.secondary: Collaborate and monetize your contribution. Get rewarded for your work with the GitPay community
welcome.pricing.title: Pricing
welcome.pricing.description: Check out the options to boost your company, with deliverables to fit your needs
welcome.integration.title: Integration
welcome.integration.subtitle: Check out our GitHub app
welcome.integration.desc: You can install our GitPay app on your GitHub to boost your issues
welcome.bottom.call: A better way to complete your projects through a better way to work on projects
